plot: Practically robbed of their proper names, the title characters of this film flee from their small town and from the epithets that they have chosen or, conversely, that have been imposed ...
title: El Inca, la boba y el hijo del ladrón
plot_es: Practically robbed of their proper names, the title characters of this film flee from their small town and from the epithets that they have chosen or, conversely, that have been imposed ...
